title: SpyralClip- SET OF TWO- Small Gold Finish 2-1/2"- Small size for comfortably securing hair half back. Or updo for shorter fine hair. Made in China.
features: These clip are intended to replace jaw clip stye barrettes-- they are NOT meant to be used as a ponytail holder (better buy an elastic for that :-). These fasten your hair comfortably and securely in an updo style.
The small size is most popular for half-back/half-up styles or an updo for super fine shorter length hair.
Easy to use, comfortable and secure! Accommodates fine to think hair. One continuous piece of steel so no hinges to break!
Finally an affordable ZannClip! PLEASE NOTE: These are SpyralClips NOT the USA made Lifetime Guarantee ZannClips.
description: Hold your hair firmly in place without creasing or denting its style. And create a wide variety of looks using this ingenious spiral hair clip. It's designed to work without damaging your lustrous locks. Small Gold electroplated metal.
